transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji mam, main Tejas baat kar raha hun IndiaMART company se.
Customer: Ji sir boliye.
Executive: Sir ye Arvind sir ne aapka number share kiya tha mere ko aapke account ke regarding aap hi hai na jo concern person jo completely account ko handle karti hai sari cheeze.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai. To like main thoda sa introduce kar deta hun main mera naam Tejas hai like mere se pehle aapki Pranshi Verma mam se baat hoti hogi like wo last assign person thi aapke jinse aapka contact rehta tha hai na? To like abhi kya hai ki meri kuch expertise hai achi jo catalog engagement mein bhi rahi hai to company ne assign kiya hai mere ko aapka jo account hai ki like for further acha kuch hum nikal paye. Abhi overall agar main aapse puchun to inquiries ka flow acha aa raha hai hai na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To inquiries mein jaise agar hum baat kare to kaisa rahega conversion wagera kaise chal raha hai aapko matlab relevant inquiries aati hai aapki ya nahi aati hai thoda sa mujhe batayenge fir us hisab se hum thoda baat kare.
Customer: Inquiry to aati hai. Isme ye chota kg ka jo sir aata hai wo nahi chahiye tha 5 kg, 2 kg, 3 kg.
Executive: Achcha quantities wagera ka scene hai achcha chota jaise state wise bhi keh rahe hain kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi state wise wo nahi wo to apna hi aata hai wo pehle aata tha to usko change kara diya gaya hai. Hmm.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Other state se nahi aata tha to.
Executive: Achcha main dekh raha tha ki aapke paas panel open hoga main aapko do teen cheeze batana chah raha tha jo aap thoda sa dhyan de le to acha rahega to jisse hum thoda aur improvement la paye. Jaise aap apna product section kholiye product section mein jaake all products aa rahe honge around. Ji.

Customer: Ji products mein gaye.
Executive: Haan ji usme dekhiye active aapke 38 products aa rahe hain right. Jo all products likha hua hai na all products 38. Ji ji ji.
Executive: Haan aap ek kaam karenge main aapko agar aapki primary email id pe link share karun to aap google meet join kar sakte hain aur screen share kar sakte hain usse like main bhi aapko guide kar paun. Ji ji ji.
Executive: Haan ek minute line pe rahiyega main aapko aapke link share kar deta hun primary email id pe. Okay.
Executive: Aapka same number whatsapp pe bhi hai mam?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Theek hai main us pe bhi aapko link share kar deta hun hai na aap ek baar mail aur check kar lijiye aur main whatsapp bhi share kar de raha hun.
Customer: Mail pe share kijiye. Okay aap mail.
Customer: Join kare? Haan ji haan ji.
Customer: Join kare? Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: Ek baar mam apna screen share kar denge panel ka? Kar rahe hain kar rahe hain sir. Entire screen lijiyega.

Customer: Kar diye.
Executive: Ek baar apna panel open kar lijiye normally. Ek minute. Ji. Dekhiye aapka jo all product section likha hua hai na uske right hand side pe ek product hai low score wala. Ji.
Executive: Aap us pe low score pe click kariye aur ye jo product hai. Click karne ke liye bolenge? Haan ji haan ji is pe click karenge na ye ye product hai isme kya sir mam description nahi dala hua hai is product ka to aap isme pehle to description dal dijiye. Description ke liye inse pehle wo thi Priyanshu Verma naam ki thi jo madam wo boli thi ki hum dal denge description mein hum. Achcha achcha dekhiye aapko agar aisa hai to aap ek kaam kar sakte hain jaise aapka ye jo product hai na is product ka dal ke chat GPT se bhi description bana sakte hain aap agar use karte ho to. Ji. Aap ek naya tab main aapko guide kar deta hun to aapko aage easy ho jayega har ek jagah pe aapko kaam aayega chat GPT aap open kar lijiye ek naya tab open kar lijiye. Okay. Ek naya tab open kar lijiye. Search kijiye chat GPT. Bole to kya bole hain? Chat GPT search kariye mam. Ji sir mam yahi hai second wala. Yahi hai mam jaiye second second wala. Ji. Ji ji ji. Ji. Ye wali website aap open kar lijiye first wali jo hai. Ye. Haan. Aapka screen mam kuch jyada haan theek hai. Yaha pe mam aap directly type kar dijiye ki write a description. Right. Haan write a description.
Hmm. For the product. Ek minute. Right a description. For a product. For. Haan for for for a product. For. Write a description for a product. Aur uske baad mam jo apna panel hai na panel mein jaiye aur wo product ka name copy kariye pura.
Aawaz aa rahi hai na aapko mam meri? Ji ji. Haan ji. Yaha pe kaun sa copy paste karna hai copy karna hai? Aap ek baar panel pe aaiye aapka net net on hai aapka? Mere khyal se mere mein thoda sa freeze ho gaya aapka screen. On hai. Okay ho gaya sir. Mam main aapko whatsapp pe direct call kar deta hun. Okay. Okay whatsapp pe call receive nahi hua. Nahi lagta hai. To mam aap mujhe ya to koi aur number de dijiye to main directly aapse connect karun. Aisa ye connect kar rahe hain. Main aapko direct aapke number pe call kar deta hun theek hai na? Okay. Haan actually ye DID number hai to wo directly company ke through se aa rahi hai na isliye to wo connection ho nahi pa raha hai aawaz thodi kat rahi hai main direct call karta hun apne number se aapko. Okay. Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Does not want small quantity inquiries.

- Product description not added to products.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide on Google Meet.

- Executive shared Google Meet link on mail and WhatsApp.

- Executive explained how to generate product description using Chat GPT.

- Executive offered to call directly due to connection issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer directly.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product description, chat gpt, google meet
